fields.name: Activation Variable
fields.description: The local variable number that triggers or activates this actor. (0 = always active)

fields.name: Buried State
fields.description: Defines the buried state of the Force Gem.

0.name: Buried Visible
0.description: The Force Gem is buried but visible.

1.name: Buried Deep
1.description: The Force Gem is buried deeply and not visible.

2.name: Buried Visible, Requires Active Variable
2.description: The Force Gem is buried but visible and requires the activation of a local variable to appear.

3.name: Buried Deep, Requires Active Variable
3.description: The Force Gem is buried deeply and requires the activation of a local variable to appear.

5.name: Secret SE, Requires Active Variable
5.description: Plays secret(SE), requires the activation of a local variable.

fields.name: Force Gem Type
fields.description: Defines the type of the buried Force Gem.
